title: My Treatment
description:
Everything you need to know about your treatment.
 
My Treatment is for you who has to go through a major operation in a hospital. With animated films, visualisations and guidance, you and your relatives will become prepared for everything you have to go through before, during and after the hospital admission.
 
My Treatment also provides you with help for rehabilitation through simple animations, a symptom guide for quick clarification of your condition, notebook to remember important questions for the doctor, and much more.
 
Use the login provided to you by your hospital.
If you have not received a login, ask your hospital department whether My Treatment is available for your treatment.
 
Contents:
- visual narratives about your entire treatment
- written information
- training exercises
- symptom guide
- questions and answers
- reminders about your fasting, training, etc.
- contact to your department
- and more
